abstract: iron mountain incorporated reit stock price down 7.1 % on insider selling .
article: shares of iron mountain incorporated reit fell 7.1 % during mid-day trading on tuesday after an insider sold shares in the company . the company traded as low as $ 37.59 and last traded at $ 37.80 . 8,602,287 shares changed hands during trading , an increase of 585 % from the average session volume of 1,255,832 shares . the stock had previously closed at $ 40.70 . specifically , vp patrick j. keddy sold 23,428 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction dated wednesday , october 11th . the shares were sold at an average price of $ 39.04 , for a total value of $ 914,629.12 .

the sale was disclosed in a legal filing with the sec , which is available at the sec website . also , cmo theodore maclean sold 1,495 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction dated friday , december 8th . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 40.07 , for a total transaction of $ 59,904.65 . following the completion of the sale , the chief marketing officer now owns 7,184 shares in the company , valued at approximately $ 287,862.88 . the disclosure for this sale can be found here . in the last 90 days , insiders sold 32,216 shares of company stock worth $ 1,268,850 .

corporate insiders own 1.50 % of the company 's stock . irm has been the topic of a number of recent analyst reports . bidaskclub upgraded shares of iron mountain incorporated reit from a `` buy '' rating to a `` strong-buy '' rating in a report on saturday , august 26th . robert w. baird set a $ 39.00 price target on shares of iron mountain incorporated reit and gave the company a `` hold '' rating in a report on friday , august 25th . stifel nicolaus reiterated a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 40.00 price target on shares of iron mountain incorporated reit in a report on sunday , september 3rd .

zacks investment research cut shares of iron mountain incorporated reit from a `` hold '' rating to a `` sell '' rating in a report on monday , october 2nd . finally , evercore isi initiated coverage on shares of iron mountain incorporated reit in a report on wednesday , october 18th . they set an `` outperform '' rating and a $ 46.00 price target on the stock . one equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating , three have assigned a hold rating , two have given a buy rating and one has given a strong buy rating to the stock .

the company has an average rating of `` hold '' and an average target price of $ 41.20 . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 3.59 , a quick ratio of 1.08 and a current ratio of 1.08 . the stock has a market capitalization of $ 10,709.52 , a price-to-earnings ratio of 19.29 , a p/e/g ratio of 6.26 and a beta of 1.00 . iron mountain incorporated reit last posted its quarterly earnings results on tuesday , october 24th . the financial services provider reported $ 0.31 eps for the quarter , beating the zacks ' consensus estimate of $ 0.29 by $ 0.02 .

the firm had revenue of $ 966.00 million for the quarter , compared to analysts ' expectations of $ 960.99 million . iron mountain incorporated reit had a net margin of 5.54 % and a return on equity of 15.49 % . the business 's revenue for the quarter was up 2.4 % on a year-over-year basis . during the same quarter in the prior year , the company posted $ 0.44 earnings per share . sell-side analysts forecast that iron mountain incorporated will post 2.14 earnings per share for the current year . the business also recently disclosed a quarterly dividend , which will be paid on tuesday , january 2nd .

investors of record on friday , december 15th will be given a dividend of $ 0.5875 per share . this is an increase from iron mountain incorporated reit 's previous quarterly dividend of $ 0.55 . the ex-dividend date of this dividend is thursday , december 14th . this represents a $ 2.35 dividend on an annualized basis and a yield of 6.22 % . iron mountain incorporated reit 's dividend payout ratio is 275.00 % . a number of institutional investors have recently modified their holdings of the stock . public employees retirement system of ohio lifted its position in iron mountain incorporated reit by 2.2 % during the third quarter .

public employees retirement system of ohio now owns 114,291 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 4,446,000 after purchasing an additional 2,505 shares during the period . moors & cabot inc. . lifted its position in iron mountain incorporated reit by 57.5 % during the third quarter . moors & cabot inc. . now owns 14,319 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 557,000 after purchasing an additional 5,228 shares during the period . ifm investors pty ltd bought a new position in iron mountain incorporated reit during the third quarter valued at approximately $ 370,000 .

neuberger berman group llc lifted its position in iron mountain incorporated reit by 9.3 % during the third quarter . neuberger berman group llc now owns 1,546,789 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 60,170,000 after purchasing an additional 131,626 shares during the period . finally , california public employees retirement system lifted its position in iron mountain incorporated reit by 4.0 % during the third quarter . california public employees retirement system now owns 807,575 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 31,415,000 after purchasing an additional 30,701 shares during the period .
